verses.verse: And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did <WH6213> evil <WH7451> again <WH3254> in the sight <WH5869> of the LORD <WH3068>; and the LORD <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> them into the hand <WH3027> of the Philistines <WH6430> forty <WH705> years <WH8141>. did evil: Heb. added to commit, etc

And there was a certain <WH259> man <WH376> of Zorah <WH6881>, of the family <WH4940> of the Danites <WH1839>, whose name <WH8034> was Manoah <WH4495>; and his wife <WH802> was barren <WH6135>, and bare <WH3205> not.

And the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> unto the woman <WH802>, and said <WH559> unto her, Behold now, thou art barren <WH6135>, and bearest <WH3205> not: but thou shalt conceive <WH2029>, and bear <WH3205> a son <WH1121>.
Now therefore beware <WH8104>, I pray thee, and drink <WH8354> not wine <WH3196> nor strong drink <WH7941>, and eat <WH398> not any unclean <WH2931> thing:

For, lo, thou shalt conceive <WH2030>, and bear <WH3205> a son <WH1121>; and no razor <WH4177> shall come <WH5927> on his head <WH7218>: for the child <WH5288> shall be a Nazarite <WH5139> unto God <WH430> from the womb <WH990>: and he shall begin <WH2490> to deliver <WH3467> Israel <WH3478> out of the hand <WH3027> of the Philistines <WH6430>.

Then the woman <WH802> came <WH935> and told <WH559> her husband <WH376>, saying <WH559>, A man <WH376> of God <WH430> came <WH935> unto me, and his countenance <WH4758> was like the countenance <WH4758> of an angel <WH4397> of God <WH430>, very <WH3966> terrible <WH3372>: but I asked <WH7592> him not whence he was, neither told <WH5046> he me his name <WH8034>:

But he said <WH559> unto me, Behold, thou shalt conceive <WH2030>, and bear <WH3205> a son <WH1121>; and now drink <WH7941> no wine <WH3196> nor strong drink <WH8354>, neither eat <WH398> any unclean <WH2932> thing: for the child <WH5288> shall be a Nazarite <WH5139> to God <WH430> from the womb <WH990> to the day <WH3117> of his death <WH4194>.

Then Manoah <WH4495> intreated <WH6279> the LORD <WH3068>, and said <WH559>, O <WH994> my Lord <WH136>, let <WH4994> the man <WH376> of God <WH430> which thou didst send <WH7971> come again <WH935> unto us, and teach <WH3384> us what we shall do <WH6213> unto the child <WH5288> that shall be born <WH3205>.

And God <WH430> hearkened <WH8085> to the voice <WH6963> of Manoah <WH4495>; and the angel <WH4397> of God <WH430> came again <WH935> unto the woman <WH802> as she sat <WH3427> in the field <WH7704>: but Manoah <WH4495> her husband <WH376> was not with her.

And the woman <WH802> made haste <WH4116>, and ran <WH7323>, and shewed <WH5046> her husband <WH376>, and said <WH559> unto him, Behold, the man <WH376> hath appeared <WH7200> unto me, that came <WH935> unto me the other day <WH3117>.

And Manoah <WH4495> arose <WH6965>, and went <WH3212> after <WH310> his wife <WH802>, and came <WH935> to the man <WH376>, and said <WH559> unto him, Art thou the man <WH376> that spakest <WH1696> unto the woman <WH802>? And he said <WH559>, I am.

And Manoah <WH4495> said <WH559>, Now let thy words <WH1697> come to pass <WH935>. How shall we order <WH4941> the child <WH5288>, and how shall we do <WH4639> unto him? How shall we order: Heb. What shall be the manner of the, etc how shall we do: or, what shall he do?: Heb. what shall be his work?
And the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Manoah <WH4495>, Of all that I said <WH559> unto the woman <WH802> let her beware <WH8104>.

She may not eat <WH398> of any thing that cometh <WH3318> of the vine <WH1612>, neither let her drink <WH8354> wine <WH3196> or strong drink <WH7941>, nor eat <WH398> any unclean <WH2932> thing: all that I commanded <WH6680> her let her observe <WH8104>.

And Manoah <WH4495> said <WH559> unto the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068>, I pray thee, let us detain <WH6113> thee, until we shall have made ready <WH6213> a kid <WH1423> <WH5795> for <WH6440> thee. for thee: Heb. before thee

And the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Manoah <WH4495>, Though thou detain <WH6113> me, I will not eat <WH398> of thy bread <WH3899>: and if <WH518> thou wilt offer <WH6213> a burnt offering <WH5930>, thou must offer <WH5927> it unto the LORD <WH3068>. For Manoah <WH4495> knew <WH3045> not that he was an angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068>.
And Manoah <WH4495> said <WH559> unto the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068>, What is thy name <WH8034>, that when thy sayings <WH1697> come to pass <WH935> we may do thee honour <WH3513>?
And the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto him, Why askest <WH7592> thou thus after my name <WH8034>, seeing it is secret <WH6383> <WH6383>? secret: or, wonderful

So Manoah <WH4495> took <WH3947> a kid <WH1423> <WH5795> with a meat offering <WH4503>, and offered <WH5927> it upon a rock <WH6697> unto the LORD <WH3068>: and the angel did <WH6213> wondrously <WH6381>; and Manoah <WH4495> and his wife <WH802> looked on <WH7200>.

For it came to pass, when the flame <WH3851> went up <WH5927> toward heaven <WH8064> from off the altar <WH4196>, that the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> ascended <WH5927> in the flame <WH3851> of the altar <WH4196>. And Manoah <WH4495> and his wife <WH802> looked on <WH7200> it, and fell on <WH5307> their faces <WH6440> to the ground <WH776>.

But the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> did no more <WH3254> appear <WH7200> to Manoah <WH4495> and to his wife <WH802>. Then Manoah <WH4495> knew <WH3045> that he was an angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068>.
And Manoah <WH4495> said <WH559> unto his wife <WH802>, We shall surely <WH4191> die <WH4191>, because we have seen <WH7200> God <WH430>.

But his wife <WH802> said <WH559> unto him, If <WH3863> the LORD <WH3068> were pleased <WH2654> to kill <WH4191> us, he would not have received <WH3947> a burnt offering <WH5930> and a meat offering <WH4503> at our hands <WH3027>, neither would he have shewed <WH7200> us all these things, nor would as at this time <WH6256> have told <WH8085> us such things as these <WH2063>.
And the woman <WH802> bare <WH3205> a son <WH1121>, and called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Samson <WH8123>: and the child <WH5288> grew <WH1431>, and the LORD <WH3068> blessed <WH1288> him.
And the Spirit <WH7307> of the LORD <WH3068> began <WH2490> to move him at times <WH6470> in the camp <WH4264> of Dan <WH1835> between Zorah <WH6881> and Eshtaol <WH847>. the camp: Heb. Mahanehdan
